name: A Silent Voice (Koe no Katachi by Kyoto Animation) Style LoRA
description:
A Silent Voice (Koe no Katachi by Kyoto Animation) style LoRA

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️, feel free to buy me a coffee ☕ or just leave a ❤️

One of my favourite anime ever from one of my favourite studios. Been wanting to make a Kyoto Animation LoRA for quite some time but I'm always late and a good one is already made every time.

Anyway, this should be pretty straightforward to use like all my recent ones. Just use AnyLoRA as base model, weight 1 and koe no katachi as trigger. Please enjoy!

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight according to the instructions (by default it's :1)
